verses.name: Ezekiel 41:8
verses.text: I saw also the height of the house round about: the foundations of the side chambers were a full reed of six great cubits.

verses.name: Ezekiel 41:9
verses.text: The thickness of the wall, which was for the side chamber without, was five cubits: and that which was left was the place of the side chambers that were within.

verses.name: Ezekiel 41:10
verses.text: And between the chambers was the wideness of twenty cubits round about the house on every side.
